body:
DECLARE @DocEntry INT = $CURSOR$
INSERT INTO dbo.POS_CRMv2_SIMSOFT_PUSH
    (
         DocEntry
       , InvoiceCode
       , CustomerCode
       , CustomerName
       , CustomerPhone
       , CustomerType
       , WarehouseCodeB1
       , ExDate
       , CreateBy
       , U_TMonBi
       , CreateDateTime
    )
SELECT
    O.DocEntry
  , ISNULL(O.U_NuBill, O.DocEntry)
  , O.CardCode
  , O.CardName
  , O.LicTradNum
  , ''
  , O.U_ShpCod
  , O.U_ExDate
  , O.CreateBy
  , O.U_TMonBi
  , GETDATE()
FROM
    ORDR O (NOLOCK)
WHERE
    DocEntry = @DocEntry
	AND O.DocStatus = 'F'
